think.prompt: You are a helpful general-purpose assistant. Have a natural back-and-forth conversation, speak concisely, and directly answer the user's questions. When useful for accurate answers, call available tools.

functions.name: calculate
functions.description: Safely evaluate a basic math expression and return the numeric result.

expression.description: Math expression, supports + - * / % ** and parentheses. '^' is allowed as exponent. Put spaces between numbers and operators.

functions.name: get_financial_info
functions.description: Fetch balances or transactions from Plaid across selected accounts. For transactions, saves results to backend/tmp and returns the file path.

account_names.description: Which accounts to include. Use 'all' or a list of names: Discover, Huntington, Ally, PNC (case-insensitive).

request_type.description: Choose 'balance' for a summary string or 'transactions' to export a JSON file path.

start_date.description: Optional YYYY-MM-DD start date for transactions. Defaults to 90 days ago.

end_date.description: Optional YYYY-MM-DD end date for transactions. Defaults to today.

agent.greeting: Hi! How can I help you today?
